title: can this laptop run league

embed.description: Shop Staples® for HP Pavilion 14-ab167us 14'' HD BrightView Intel® Core™ i5-5200U 1TB ,8GB Win 10 Home Notebook, Silver. Enjoy everyday low prices and get everything you need for a home office or business.

body: I want to know since im planning to get it

replies.body: I used to play League on a lesser Pavilion model and that ran League perfectly. This'll work well for you. fps never exceeded 60, though, but since this is a newer model it might..
Yeah i hate when my fps drops and when i ues a skill it wont respond it pisses me off XD

lagging isa part of the network, and for the most part is never really league's or your fault... normally outside causes, ISp failures, or CDN's... never fear it shall do.

Or to quote Babe: "That'll do, pig, That'll do.
So will it lag or something?
FPS=frames per second, so not necessarily. Getting a framerate drop will make a game feel slightly less responsive, but it won't be anything too bad so long as it stays above 30 frames.
Probably. You can run League on a fucking potato. The processor is fine, it has more than enough RAM, and I'm fairly certain although it has an integrated video card, it'll get the job done.
Yes it will... granted the fps will probably remain at 60 and sometimes drop below but it should be fairly stable.
